meanings.sent1: The toy was overpackaged in so much wrapping paper that it took forever to open.
meanings.sent2: The overpackaged gift box had layers of unnecessary tape and cardboard.
meanings.sent3: The overpackaged snack had more wrappers than actual food inside!
meanings.sent4: The overpackaged product felt like a burden to carry due to all the extra packaging.
meanings.sent5: The overpackaged item was like a present within a present, but not in a good way.

meanings.definition: Packaged in a way that uses more materials than necessary
meanings.sent1: The overpackaged shipment had too many boxes for such a small order.
meanings.sent2: The overpackaged lunch had individually wrapped items that could have been grouped together.
meanings.sent3: The overpackaged sandwich had each ingredient in its own separate container!
meanings.sent4: The overpackaged bundle of newspapers used up more paper than needed.
meanings.sent5: The overpackaged product was like a puzzle of packaging materials waiting to be solved.
